languages.text: "Вы сказали, мой друг волен принять только одну сторону дара?"

traits.locale_text: "Вы сказали, мой друг волен принять только одну сторону дара?"

languages.text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"
languages.original_text: "Вы сказали, мой друг волен принять только одну сторону дара?"

traits.locale_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"
"You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"
"You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"
"You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

languages.text: «Ha comentado que mi amigo podía aceptar solo un aspecto del regalo. ¿Qué quería decir?».
languages.original_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha comentado que mi amigo podía aceptar solo un aspecto del regalo. ¿Qué quería decir?».

languages.text: 「友人は、贈り物のひとつの側面だけを選んでもよいということか？」
languages.original_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

traits.locale_text: 「友人は、贈り物のひとつの側面だけを選んでもよいということか？」

languages.text: “你刚刚说，我的朋友可以选择只接受这个礼物的其中一种含义？”
languages.original_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

traits.locale_text: “你刚刚说，我的朋友可以选择只接受这个礼物的其中一种含义？”

languages.text: « Vous avez dit que mon {mf|ami|amie} pouvait choisir de n'accepter qu'un aspect du cadeau ? »
languages.original_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez dit que mon {mf|ami|amie} pouvait choisir de n'accepter qu'un aspect du cadeau ? »

languages.text: "Ihr sagtet, mein Freunde könne entscheiden, nur einen Aspekt des Geschenks anzunehmen?"
languages.original_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagtet, mein Freunde könne entscheiden, nur einen Aspekt des Geschenks anzunehmen?"

languages.text: "Arkadaşımın isterse hediyenin sadece tek bir yönünü kabul etmeyi seçebileceğini mi söyledin?"
languages.original_text: "You said that my friend could choose to accept only one aspect of the gift?"

traits.locale_text: "Arkadaşımın isterse hediyenin sadece tek bir yönünü kabul etmeyi seçebileceğini mi söyledin?"
